messages.title: Foster fights for MoD jobs
messages.content: Plans to move 3,000 defence jobs out of Bath have been challenged by Don Foster. The Ministry of Defence has long intended to close some of its sites in the city, but recently indicated that three may actually be shut down.

messages.title: MPs should ignore local issues Conservative candidate says
messages.content: MPs should be surprised that people will be surprised when the Conservatives say they 'could do another five years' and are not interested 'that much' in local issues.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Don Foster or the Conservatives Labour can't win. A vote for the Green Party or Labour in the west will let the Tories in.

issues.environment: Don Foster and Liberal Democrat councillors joined the community clean-up of Linear Park.

leaflet.personalStatement: 'Don is a real heavyweight, respected in Bath and Westminster?' - Kate, city resident

images.caption: Don Foster and Liberal Democrat councillors joined the community clean-up of Linear Park.
